title: Call the Gradio backend — get_assignmnent_feedback
text: Function call Gradio backend LLM homework_name student answer.

title: Call the Gradio backend — get_assignmnent_feedback
text: homework_name Homework name format homeworkXqY X homework number Y question number. student_answer Student answer. container_name Name container.

title: Call the Gradio backend — get_assignmnent_feedback
text: feedback returned funky format Gradio's API supports streaming results get nice clean JSON. Instead get line text event status followed actual LLM \n " escaped something like following:

title: Call the Gradio backend — get_assignmnent_feedback
code:
feedback <- get_assignmnent_feedback(   homework_name = "homework1-q1",   student_answer = "give me the question",   container_name = "container_hostname_as_a_session_id" ) #> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8. feedback #> [1] "event: complete
data: ["**Feedback:**  \nYour response does not address the task at hand. You are required to visualize population density data using histograms and provide commentary on binwidth choices. \n\n- \u274c Code produces a histogram with binwidth 100.  \n  You did not provide any code or histograms as required by the question.\n\n- \u274c Code produces a histogram with binwidth 1,000.  \n  Your response lacks any plot or code that shows this binwidth.\n\n- \u274c Code produces a histogram with binwidth 10,000.  \n  There is no histogram included for this binwidth in your response.\n\n- \u274c Code produces a histogram with binwidth 100,000.  \n  You failed to provide any histogram for this binwidth as well.\n\n- \u274c All plots have informative and human-readable titles and/or subtitles and axis labels.  \n  This item was not addressed in your response since no plots were provided.\n\n- \u274c Code style and readability: Line breaks after each +, proper indentation, spaces around = signs if they are present, and spaces after commas if they are present.  \n  Your response did not include code, so style and readability could not be assessed.\n\n- \u274c Narrative mentions an appropriate binwidth (1000 or 10000).  \n  You have not provided a narrative or any explanation regarding binwidth choices.\n\n- \u274c Narrative states a well-articulated and accurate reason stated for the chosen binwidth.  \n  You did not provide any commentary or reasoning in your response.\n\nTo improve, please answer the original question by providing the required histograms and commentary."]

"
